pages.text: These are the playthings your cat needs.

pages.title: Cat Toy
pages.text: The basic toy, shaped like a mouse, that your cat will love. Throw it, and your cat will bring it back.

pages.title: Ball of yarn
pages.text: You weren't using this to crochet something, were you?

pages.title: Cardboard box
pages.text: Who cares what came in it? It's the box that's the most fun.
